◆ BOARD_LFCLKSRC_STRUCT

#define BOARD_LFCLKSRC_STRUCT
Value:
{.source = NRF_CLOCK_LF_SRC_XTAL, \
.rc_ctiv = 0, \
.rc_temp_ctiv = 0, \
.xtal_accuracy = NRF_CLOCK_LF_XTAL_ACCURACY_20_PPM}

Low frequency clock source used when initializing the SoftDevice
